title: Token gesture
creator_credit: Micheline Lanctot, Julie McGregor and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Witty and animated look at sex-role stereotypes and conditioning, examining the historical development of these attitudes starting at birth and continuing through adulthood. Also looks at the tokenism of some gestures made to establish more flexibility in these roles.
